name: THERMALS
description:
Tips:

  • Don't play this if you have photosensitive epilepsy! Continue at your own risk!
  • Pretend you have a sword
  • Pretend you're running around
  • Head south first
  • Don't mind the shadows
  • Please don't sue me if I forgot to credit you
  • WASD to move, Left Click to attack
  • Running around increases your temperature, so like chill out bro
  • DON'T DIE
  • Overheating is deadly, for you and your enemies. Ka-booom!
  • Also, if you having issues running it, or run into weird loading bugs, play it from the Godot Editor.  I'm starting to think it only works right in the editor.
